amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Rural Energy for America Program (REAP) by $1 million offset by a reduction in the account for the Office of the Chief Information Officer by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Rural Energy for America Program by $1 million offset by a reduction in the account for the Office of the Chief Information Officer by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Fortenberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
